column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Sokka says : " Suki , what are the chances you can get me backstage ?
#Text=I think I could get you backstage !
#Text=" Toph says : " Geez , everyone 's getting so upset about their characters .
#Text=Even you seem more down than usual , and that 's saying something !
#Text=" Zuko says : " You do n't get it , it 's different for you .
#Text=You get a muscly version of yourself , taking down ten bad guys at once , and making sassy remarks .
#Text=" Toph says : " Yeah , that 's pretty great !
#Text=" Zuko says : " But for me , it takes all the mistakes I 've made in my life , and shoves them back in my face .
#Text=My uncle , he 's always been on my side , even when things were bad .
#Text=He was there for me , he taught me so much , and how do I repay him ?
#Text=With a knife in his back .
#Text=It 's my greatest regret , and I may never get to redeem myself .
#Text=" Toph says : " You have redeemed yourself to your uncle .
#Text=You do n't realize it , but you already have .
#Text=" Zuko says : " How do you know ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Because I once had a long conversation with the guy , and all he would talk about was you .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Really ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Yeah , and it was kind of annoying .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Oh , sorry .
#Text=" Toph says : " But it was also very sweet .
#Text=All your uncle wanted was for you to find your own path , and see the light .
#Text=Now you 're here with us .
#Text=He 'd be proud .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Ow !
#Text=What was that for ?
#Text=" Toph says : " That 's how I show affection .
#Text=" Young boy says : " Your Zuko costume 's pretty good , but your scar 's on the wrong side .
#Text=" Zuko says : " The scar 's not on the wrong side !
#Text="
